entry.title: Celtic Set for Monday Contract Talks
entry.summary: It was late Saturday evening when the news broke Celtic had a bid accepted for St Mirren midfielder Dylan Reid. The Scottish Champions are not just planning for now, but for the future. Chris McCart and the youth scouts have identified Dylan as a massive prospect. The club are willing to put down £125k for […] Source

entry.summary: JOE HART made a bad mistake for the first goal when he couldn’t clear his lines click enough. It meant Rapid equalised and the goalkeeper looked disheartened. entry.title: Ange Postecoglou well poised to strike in transfer market after initial Celtic business
entry.summary: Ange Postecoglou insists Celtic are “not stressed” about transfer business, sounding like a man fully in control of the situation this summer. The club have already made significant acquisitions since the end of the season. Jota and Cameron Carter-Vickers have signed up permanently for big fees, while Alexandro Bernabei and Ben Siegrist have also been ... entry.title: Joe Hart Makes Celtic Champions League Statement
entry.summary: JOE HART is gearing up for Champions League football six years after he last played in the competition. The English goalkeeper helped Celtic to a famous title win in the 21/22 season and as a result, Celtic will be playing in the Champions League this season. Joe has been in the competition with Manchester City […] Source

entry.title: Celtic star is excited to end 6-year career wait at Bhoys
entry.summary: Joe Hart is excited to take part in the UEFA Champions League with Celtic this autumn, ending a six-year wait to feature in the competition. Hart last played in the tournament back in the 2015/16 edition, when Manchester City reached the semi-finals only to be narrowly knocked out by Real Madrid. Now, after winning the ... entry.title: Celtic’s Police Scotland Security Bill
entry.summary: When Celtic fans turn up for a match day, they take everything for granted. The stadium opening on time, the kiosks serving food and the watered down Coca Cola being poured. entry.title: The Champions League reality facing Celtic that critics will conveniently forget
entry.summary: It can’t be overstated how difficult it will be for Celtic to qualify from their upcoming UEFA Champions League group into the knockout stages of the competition. entry.title: Celtic fringe player praised by Postecoglou after Austria shift
entry.summary: Osaze Urhoghide has had a surprisingly prominent role to play in Celtic’s opening pre-season games, being the only player who has completed both 90 minutes against Wiener Viktoria and Rapid Vienna.
